about_the_game:
Well hello there handsome! The name's Miss Wolfy and I'll be guiding you throughout this adventure (＾ *)✿

Super Cursor is a challenging precision platformer where you control your very own mouse cursor, who is brought to life and given his own personality! Move through the world as you dodge obstacles and enemies who are stopping you from reaching your beloved princess.

Be careful though, as anything that you touch will kill you instantly and you will have to start all over again!


Dont worry, as only the tip of your cursor will cause damage to you!
Absolutely no mistakes are allowed, can you make it to the end and free the princess and myself, or will we be together forever and ever? (ʘ‿ʘ)ﾉ✿

Features:


  • Dodge obstacles, enemies, and projectiles thrown your way.
  • Original characters, soundtracks and world.
  • Online Co-op because two heads are better than one right?
  • Bring personality to your cursor.
  • Funny, satirical, and rich dialogue.
  • Become a time traveler?
  • Gameplay that extends outside the game.

name: Super Cursor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics, 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 / AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Start your journey in Cursor Ville, where you'll be tested in your precision, agility, patience, and determination! Will you be able make your ways through the treacherous world and save your beloved princess? YOU are the cursor! Aim, dodge, move, and most importantly, never give up!
